word: Universal Nature of the Third Angel's Message.--Every feature of the third angel's message is to be proclaimed in all parts of the world. . . . This message is a testing message. Received into honest hearts, it will prove an antidote for all the world's sins and sorrows. No conditions of climate, of poverty, or ignorance, or of prejudice can hinder its efficiency, or lessen its adaptability to the needs of mankind.--Manuscript 75, 1906, p. 3. ("A Caution Against Heavy Investment in Food Manufacture," September 29, 1906.)
